indications:
Indications treatment of mild to moderate Pneumocystis jirovecii (Pneumocystis carinii) pneumonia
in patients intolerant of co-trimoxazole
name: ATOVAQUONE
cautions:
Cautions initial diarrhoea and difficulty in taking with food may reduce absorption
(and require alternative therapy); other causes of pulmonary
disease should be sought and treated; elderly; interactions: Appendix 1 (atovaquone)
doses:
750 mg twice daily with food (particularly high fat) for
21 days; child not recommended
pregnancy:
Pregnancy manufacturer advises avoid unless potential benefit
outweighs risk—no information available
